entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:20 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 09:20 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
